verses.verse: וַיֶּאֶסֹ֧ף <WH622> vai-ye-'e-Sof gathered יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> shiv-Tei all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel שְׁכֶ֑מָה <WH7927> she-Che-mah; to Shechem וַיִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and called לְזִקְנֵ֨י <WH2205> le-zik-Nei for the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וּלְרָאשָׁ֗יו <WH7218> u-le-ra-Shav, and for their heads וּלְשֹֽׁפְטָיו֙ <WH8199> u-le-sho-fe-Tav and for their judges וּלְשֹׁ֣טְרָ֔יו <WH7860> u-le-Sho-te-Rav, and for their officers וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <WH3320> vai-yit-yatz-tze-Vu and they presented לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei themselves before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him. God

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, unto all the people כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver on the other side הַנָּהָ֗ר <WH5104> han-na-Har, of the flood יָשְׁב֤וּ <WH3427> ya-she-Vu dwelt אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem Your fathers מֵֽעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> me-'o-Lam, in old time תֶּ֛רַח <WH8646> Te-rach [even] Terah אֲבִ֥י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham וַאֲבִ֣י <WH1> va-'a-Vi and the father נָח֑וֹר <WH5152> na-Chor; of Nachor וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> vai-ya-'av-Du and they served אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <WH312> 'a-che-Rim. other

וָ֠אֶקַּח <WH3947> Va-'ek-kach And I took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבִיכֶ֤ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Chem your father אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham Abraham מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> me-'E-ver from the other side הַנָּהָ֔ר <WH5104> han-na-Har, of the flood וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> va-'o-Lech and led אוֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz him throughout all the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan; וָאֶרֶב va-'e-rev כוָאַרְבֶּה֙ <WH7235> va-'ar-Beh abundance קאֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זַרְע֔וֹ <WH2233> zar-'O, his seed וָֽאֶתֶּן־ <WH5414> va-'et-ten- and gave ל֖וֹ lo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> yitz-Chak. him Isaac

וָאֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> va-'et-Ten And I gave לְיִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> le-yitz-Chak, unto Isaac אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav; and Esau וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> va-'et-Ten and I gave לְעֵשָׂ֜ו <WH6215> le-'e-Sav unto Esau אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֤ר <WH2022> har mount שֵׂעִיר֙ <WH8165> se-'Ir Seir לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> la-Re-shet to possess אוֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, וְיַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> ve-ya-'a-Ko it but Jacob וּבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav and his children יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> ya-re-Du went down מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. into Egypt

וָאֶשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> va-'esh-Lach I sent אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron also and Aaron וָאֶגֹּ֣ף <WH5062> va-'eg-Gof and I plagued אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, Egypt כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher according to that which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti I did בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <WH7130> be-kir-Bo; among וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char them and afterward הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <WH3318> ho-Tze-ti I brought you out אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

וָֽאוֹצִ֤יא <WH3318> va-'o-Tzi And I brought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt וַתָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> vat-ta-Vo-'u and ye came הַיָּ֑מָּה <WH3220> hai-Yam-mah; unto the sea וַיִּרְדְּפ֨וּ <WH7291> vai-yir-de-Fu pursued מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4713> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian אַחֲרֵ֧י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers בְּרֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> be-Re-chev with chariots וּבְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <WH6571> u-ve-fa-ra-Shim and horsemen יַם־ <WH3220> yam- sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> Suf. unto the Red

וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ <WH6817> vai-yitz-'a-Ku And when they cried אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem he put מַֽאֲפֵ֜ל <WH3990> ma-'a-Fel darkness בֵּינֵיכֶ֣ם׀ <WH996> bei-nei-Chem between וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> u-Vein between הַמִּצְרִ֗ים <WH4713> ham-mitz-Rim, between you and the Egyptians וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve and brought עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> hai-Yam the sea וַיְכַסֵּ֔הוּ <WH3680> vay-chas-Se-hu, upon them and covered וַתִּרְאֶ֙ינָה֙ <WH7200> vat-tir-'Ei-nah have seen עֵינֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5869> 'ei-nei-Chem, them and your eyes אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti what I have done בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt וַתֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> vat-te-she-Vu and ye dwelt בַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> vam-mid-Bar in the wilderness יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> ya-Mim season רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> rab-Bim. a long

וָאָבִאָה va-'a-vi-'ah כוָאָבִ֣יא <WH935> va-'a-Vi abide קאֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz you into the land הָאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites הַיּוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> hai-yo-Shev which dwelt בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den, Jordan וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu and they fought אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> 'it-te-Chem; and I וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> va-'et-Ten with you and I gave אוֹתָ֤ם <WH853> o-Tam בְּיֶדְכֶם֙ <WH3027> be-yed-Chem them into your hand וַתִּֽירְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> vat-ti-re-Shu that ye might possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַרְצָ֔ם <WH776> 'ar-Tzam, their land וָאַשְׁמִידֵ֖ם <WH8045> va-'ash-mi-Dem and I destroyed מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> mip-pe-nei-Chem. them from before

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom arose בָּלָ֤ק <WH1111> ba-Lak Then Balak בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צִפּוֹר֙ <WH6834> tzip-pOr of Zippor מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, of Moab וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <WH3898> vai-yil-La-chem and warred בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El; against Israel וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach, and sent וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and called לְבִלְעָ֥ם <WH1109> le-vil-'Am Balaam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son בְּע֖וֹר <WH1160> be-'or of Beor לְקַלֵּ֥ל <WH7043> le-kal-Lel to curse אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo was not אָבִ֖יתִי <WH14> 'a-Vi-ti But I would לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> lish-Mo-a' not hearken לְבִלְעָ֑ם <WH1109> le-vil-'Am; unto Balaam וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <WH1288> vay-Va-rech therefore he blessed בָּרוֹךְ֙ <WH1288> ba-roCh you still אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, וָאַצִּ֥ל <WH5337> va-'atz-Tzil so I delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> mi-ya-Do. you out of his hand

וַתַּעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> vat-ta-'av-Ru And ye went over אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּן֮ <WH3383> hai-yar-Den Jordan וַתָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> vat-ta-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְרִיחוֹ֒ <WH3405> ye-ri-Cho unto Jericho וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <WH3898> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu fought בָכֶ֣ם va-Chem בַּעֲלֵֽי־ <WH1167> ba-'a-lei- and the men יְ֠רִיחוֹ <WH3405> ye-ri-cho of Jericho הָֽאֱמֹרִ֨י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri against you the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֜י <WH6522> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi and the Perizzites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <WH3669> ve-hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, and the Canaanites וְהַֽחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> ve-ha-chit-Ti and the Hittites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֔י <WH1622> ve-hag-gir-ga-Shi, and the Girgashites הַֽחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> ha-chiv-Vi the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <WH2983> ve-hay-vu-Si; and the Jebusites וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> va-'et-Ten and I delivered אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> o-Tam בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> be-yed-Chem. them into your hand

וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> va-'esh-Lach And I sent לִפְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH6440> lif-nei-Chem before אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַצִּרְעָ֔ה <WH6880> hatz-tzir-'Ah, the hornet וַתְּגָ֤רֶשׁ <WH1644> vat-te-Ga-resh you which drave them out אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> o-Tam מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> mip-pe-nei-Chem, from before שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> she-Nei you [even] the two מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei kings הָאֱמֹרִ֑י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri; of the Amorites לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo by בְחַרְבְּךָ֖ <WH2719> ve-char-be-Cha [but] not with thy sword וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo or בְקַשְׁתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7198> ve-kash-Te-cha. nor with thy bow

וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> va-'et-Ten And I have given לָכֶ֜ם la-Chem אֶ֣רֶץ׀ <WH776> 'E-retz you a land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- had not יָגַ֣עְתָּ <WH3021> ya-Ga'-ta for which ye did not labour בָּ֗הּ Bah, וְעָרִים֙ <WH5892> ve-'a-Rim and cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- had not בְנִיתֶ֔ם <WH1129> ve-ni-Tem, which ye built וַתֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> vat-te-she-Vu not and ye dwell בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; כְּרָמִ֤ים <WH3754> ke-ra-Mim in them of the vineyards וְזֵיתִים֙ <WH2132> ve-zei-Tim and oliveyards אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not נְטַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH5193> ne-ta'-Tem, which ye planted אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you אֹכְלִֽים׃ <WH398> 'o-che-Lim. not do ye eat

וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now יְר֧אוּ <WH3372> ye-R-'u Now therefore fear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD וְעִבְד֥וּ <WH5647> ve-'iv-Du and serve אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To בְּתָמִ֣ים <WH8549> be-ta-Mim him in sincerity וּבֶֽאֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> u-ve-'e-Met; and in truth וְהָסִ֣ירוּ <WH5493> ve-ha-Si-ru and put away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, the gods אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָבְד֨וּ <WH5647> 'a-ve-Du served אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem which your fathers בְּעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver on the other side הַנָּהָר֙ <WH5104> han-na-Har of the flood וּבְמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> u-ve-mitz-Ra-yim, and in Egypt וְעִבְד֖וּ <WH5647> ve-'iv-Du and serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. ye the LORD
